mapper.update:
update CUSTOMER
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKUNIT = #{workunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CU_STYLE = #{cuStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CU_STYLE2 = #{cuStyle2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CU_STYLE3 = #{cuStyle3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFY = #{lastmodify,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update CUSTOMER set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKUNIT = #{workunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CU_STYLE = #{cuStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CU_STYLE2 = #{cuStyle2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CU_STYLE3 = #{cuStyle3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFY = #{lastmodify,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
